reviews.author: Jennie Black
reviews.review: Well just I had horrible experience with Brooks, I was misinformed by Opportunity Council and I was under the impression opportunity council would help with first and last month rent.  I had told Meliane as good faith I could pay next month

reviews.author: Jen Caldwell
reviews.review: Renters Beware!!!!!   When we viewed the apartment it was still occupied. We had Melanie, property manager, sign a contract stating it would be clean when we moved in. This place stinks soooooo bad still! I go to work smelling like a cat

reviews.author: Olivia O.
reviews.review: Company consistently loses rent checks after they have been turned in before the due date, then blames the tenants for the mishap. Do not rent with them they cannot be trusted to keep track of your money and when they lose your checks will threaten to evict you.

reviews.author: Ty J.
reviews.review: My fianc missed 2 and half hours work for them to no show an appointment to see a property. There were 4 other potential applicants stood up.
